<i class="pstatus"> 本帖最后由 freckle 于 2025-8-8 18:24 编辑 </i><br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_EZT3e" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://im.gurl.eu.org/file/AgACAgEAAxkDAAEBQu9okVVQSnFMPlt8a-WLbMboqaSp2gAC4bAxG4YSiEQYRCFEEh2d4wEAAwIAA3gAAzYE.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://im.gurl.eu.org/file/AgACAgEAAxkDAAEBQu9okVVQSnFMPlt8a-WLbMboqaSp2gAC4bAxG4YSiEQYRCFEEh2d4wEAAwIAA3gAAzYE.png"><br>
前段时间看到个测水质的笔，挺便宜，就买了个，测了上图结构 ，<img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/default/lol.gif" smilieid="12" border="0" alt="">前后水质几乎一样，烧水也没啥水碱。<br>
本来不也不想折腾的，前几日玩游戏生气，打算装个ro。总要找个花钱的理由<img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/default/mad.gif" smilieid="11" border="0" alt=""><br>
<img id="aimg_yTD1o" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://im.gurl.eu.org/file/AgACAgEAAxkDAAEBQvBokVWcc-3tMYNEMrS80kQeGDeyPAAC4rAxG4YSiEQlRF9eCCY0bwEAAwIAA3cAAzYE.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://im.gurl.eu.org/file/AgACAgEAAxkDAAEBQvBokVWcc-3tMYNEMrS80kQeGDeyPAAC4rAxG4YSiEQlRF9eCCY0bwEAAwIAA3cAAzYE.png"><br>
大瓶小瓶拆了也是闲置，还是接了几个，如上图，前后水质还是差别很大的。看吾爱上分享的水质都是个位数，为啥我的2位数。是我买的RO滤膜型号不对吗！<br>
没有照搬吾爱分享的方案，怕可乐瓶子破了<img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/default/46.gif" smilieid="925" border="0" alt="">也没用四面阀<img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/default/titter.gif" smilieid="9" border="0" alt="">因为没看懂分享的里面是怎么用的四面阀。<br>
<img id="aimg_Z9TuN" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://im.gurl.eu.org/file/AgACAgEAAxkDAAEBQvFokVW2oO7HV5uIAsF_T80m6JEMbgAC47AxG4YSiEQIQLQq6loy3wEAAwIAA3cAAzYE.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://im.gurl.eu.org/file/AgACAgEAAxkDAAEBQvFokVW2oO7HV5uIAsF_T80m6JEMbgAC47AxG4YSiEQIQLQq6loy3wEAAwIAA3cAAzYE.png"><br>
<img id="aimg_F3C3Y" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://im.gurl.eu.org/file/AgACAgEAAxkDAAEBQvJokVXOO3Iek6uR50QOqK8_WoqucwAC5LAxG4YSiEQPoO56nT2RJAEAAwIAA3cAAzYE.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://im.gurl.eu.org/file/AgACAgEAAxkDAAEBQvJokVXOO3Iek6uR50QOqK8_WoqucwAC5LAxG4YSiEQPoO56nT2RJAEAAwIAA3cAAzYE.png"><br>
实物结构如照片中。<br>
其中6，5，都是倒置放的。<br>
6是废水，进水管是2分，出水管是4分普通钢丝网管。<br>
5是净水桶。<br>
<img id="aimg_U8YXR" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://im.gurl.eu.org/file/AgACAgEAAxkDAAEBQvRokVa5eZGB_VbBXH2gecbJJ2pBXwAC5rAxG4YSiEQmpNzqWGQwWAEAAwIAA3cAAzYE.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://im.gurl.eu.org/file/AgACAgEAAxkDAAEBQvRokVa5eZGB_VbBXH2gecbJJ2pBXwAC5rAxG4YSiEQmpNzqWGQwWAEAAwIAA3cAAzYE.png"><br>
ro流量感觉还挺好的，自然水压下流量如上图。最大水压0.4，我调到0.3左右。<br>
<br>
<br>
======================<br>
更新<br>
因6号瓶里气压太小，外流的很慢，今天换了个2分双龙头，修改如下<br>
<img id="aimg_iViEb" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://im.gurl.eu.org/file/AgACAgEAAxkDAAEBRBNolc5UvLtLA6PWM8vKVeamzlopJAACaq4xGyu5sETPsrcICo3edgEAAwIAA3cAAzYE.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://im.gurl.eu.org/file/AgACAgEAAxkDAAEBRBNolc5UvLtLA6PWM8vKVeamzlopJAACaq4xGyu5sETPsrcICo3edgEAAwIAA3cAAzYE.png"><br>
废水TDS 297，自来水TDS 237。刚放的第一碗废水大概是积攒的，TDS 有1000多<img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/default/46.gif" smilieid="925" border="0" alt=""></td></tr></tbody></table>
